entry.title: Advice for new iOS freelancers
entry.description: A friend of mine told me this morning she quit her job and is now freelancing as an iOS developer. She asked if I had any advice to share. The first thoughts to pop into my mind were:
entry.content:
A friend of mine told me this morning she quit her job and is now freelancing as an iOS developer. She asked if I had any advice to share. The first thoughts to pop into my mind were:

  • Read all you can from Brennan Dunn
  • Read all you can from Jonathan Stark
  • Read all you can from Ryan Waggoner
  • Subscribe to Matt Inglot’s Freelance Transformation podcast

Also, I talked about my workflow for finding new freelance work at last year’s 360idev conference. Unfortunately, the video recording got corrupted, so you can’t watch the talk. But I do have a PDF of slide deck that includes a transcript of the talk that some might find helpful.
